law.text: An amendment to articles of incorporation shall not affect a cause of action existing against or in favor of the corporation, a proceeding to which the corporation is a party, or the existing rights of persons other than shareholders of the corporation. An amendment changing a corporation's name shall not abate a proceeding brought by or against the corporation in its former name.
law.history: Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 111, effective January 1, 1989.
